## ThemeConfig interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ThemeConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [colorBlindnessMode?](./core.themeconfig.colorblindnessmode.md) |  | ColorBlindnessMode | <i>(Optional)</i> Set the simulated color blindness mode to use for this theme instance. |
|  [dark?](./core.themeconfig.dark.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set the color variant of the theme using one of the supported enum values. If none supplied, loads the light version. |
|  [overrides?](./core.themeconfig.overrides.md) |  | [ThemeDefinition](./core.themedefinition.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> This is override config for the theme. If you are using a theme but want specific properties set for various mark types, you can config it here and continue to use the Theme getters. |
